name: T3 Featherweight Hair Dryer
description:
I purchased this off of QVC about two years ago! I haven't used it a lot.  I still have replacement filters for it.  Paid $200.00.

" A top-of-the-line featherweight dryer with genuine tourmaline-infused components. Why is it different: Lightweight and quiet, the dryer helps control frizz, improve shine, and dry hair faster than many other dryers. It has two heat settings, a cool-shot feature, and a swivel cord."
